website_summaries.verdict: A unique twist on the typical formula dispenser design. Great for multipurpose use when you want to store more while on the go.
pros: Multipurpose use includes formula dispenser, food container, and a portable snack cup that contains potential messes
cons: Dispenser is smaller compared to more dedicated dispensing products

customer_reviews.title: Ideal dispenser for formula milk!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this stackable milk dispenser/container! It’s not only colorful, but also very practical and neat to use. My husband and I liked the fact that it can be split into 3 servings and the 3 containers have their own individual lid which prevents accidental spill of formula milk. Very convenient and lightweight as well! You can snack it in your diaper bag without worrying abt the spill and the space. The only thing that I didn’t like abt is the quantity of the dispenser/container. I wish instead of three, they made it four. Overall, a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Mikaela SJTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Work great and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.text: Love these, I’ve always had the munchkin brand dispensers for my first 2 kids but tried these out for my third. They work great, bottom twists off to fill and small top piece twist off for dispensing. It does fit well for pouring into dr browns bottles, I was worried about that since they have a slender opening. Would buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Great solution for formula and snacks
customer_reviews.text: These are great quality and a great new solution for taking formula with you. We have always used the multi-compartment container ones in the past. This design makes it so easy to transfer ALL the formula into the bottle without any mess! I love the fact that we can use them for snacks as well and we will be able to do much larger amounts of formula and snacks in this one. Its shape fits great in the diaper bag, and if it’s a short trip, I have the option of just throwing in ONE!! I highly recommend this over the one I used in the past!
customer_reviews.author: Laurie P

customer_reviews.title: The best I've found
customer_reviews.text: I looked all over for a good formula dispenser. Used the REGULAR one piece ones with 3 slots but the formula would always stick to the bottom. So I found this it was alot different so iI bought it and tried it and it is by far the best formula dispenser I've owned and I have 3 kids so we've been through our share of them 😀
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca kanterman

customer_reviews.title: So IMPRESSED!
customer_reviews.text: This is made so so well. It's easy to use, clean and travel with. Very convenient to hold powdered formula. I have put enough to make 6 ounces and have room still for more. Great stackable design. The caps loosen up at the top and formula drops directly in to bottle without any spills or mess. I've used this for about a month and had ZERO issues. Quality product with a genius design. Must have for any mom. I will definitely be using this for snacks once my little one is older.
customer_reviews.author: Momma Kat

customer_reviews.title: ... each other not screw into each other besides that love
customer_reviews.text: *****UPDATE***** I love these truly the best out of any formula dispenser, now that baby is 11 months and we are carrying less bottles these are great also for portable snacks like cherrios, raisins, goldfish! More then just for formula. Took forever to figure out that each color snaps into each other not screw into each other. Truly the best formula dispenser due to the funnel shaped top makes dumping formula out easy without having to shake to get everything out. Orderiding another now that my son is older for his snacks!
customer_reviews.author: Mizcheffy

customer_reviews.title: Must have baby item for formula feeding parents!
customer_reviews.text: This is so easy to use! It is such a difference in ease of use compared to another brand's formula dispenser. The formula just slides out instead of us having to tap it repeatedly. Half asleep, middle of the night, in a moving car...no problems! I personally just keep one section in my diaper bag at all times and then just attach the other one or two sections when we will be out for longer.
customer_reviews.author: C88

customer_reviews.title: Love this Formula dispenser!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this! It's very convenient alot fits inside. No spillage and very cute. I would recommend this to all the moms.
customer_reviews.author: Liny

customer_reviews.title: Good product of plastic
customer_reviews.text: I liked it as it solves my purpose but I gave three stars because the product doesn’t look like the picture. Its made up of cheap plastic and is not so clear and transparent as it look like in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: R.J.P

customer_reviews.title: Convenient!
customer_reviews.text: I used these containers to hold one recipe of my coffee mixture. (Whey protein, collagen, monk fruit sweetener) I ordered two sets! I fill them all up and in the morning, I just dump one container in my coffee and mix! Very convenient! I only have to take out the packages once a week!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This product works great. I have a diffrent formula dispenser and the formula would always get stuck. Do to the shape of the lid all of it comes out without any sticking.The plastic is not as clear as the picture shown. But other then that I love this product.
customer_reviews.author: kayla

customer_reviews.title: A must have for formula users
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend this to any mom that uses formula. It is easy to clean because the bottom comes off each one so no formula is left behind. It also makes fixing a bottle in public places clean and easy. No powder spilling everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Great quality product!!!
customer_reviews.text: AmaIng!!!! Stackable! I fit 6 scoops of formula comfortably in it! I bet I could add another one by no need for more lol the formula slides right out!!!!!! I don’t have to tap it to get it all out !! I’m so happy !!! Each container has a screw on cap which o LOVE!! I can use individually or stack however many I need for the day! Saves me space in my diaper bag! Colorful and just overall great quality!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sarahi Cid

customer_reviews.title: MUST HAVE FOR FORMULA FED
customer_reviews.text: If you’re exclusively formula feeding BUY THIS NOW!!!!! Buy 2! One for home and one for the diaper bag. I have these next to my bed ready to go for night feedings. No more trying to shake it out endlessly from the other ones. No missing half the bottle while still asleep. MUST HAVE BABY PRODUCT!!!!!! I lost the cap to one of mine at a baseball game and almost cried! You won’t be disappointed in these!!!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service/ formula container!
customer_reviews.text: Great customer service! I had an issue with one of my containers, and the seller was more than accommodating with replacing the damaged container. I highly recommend this formula container over types since you do not have to worry about formula amounts transferring/spilling to the different compartments which would make it hard to "dose." This will also work well for snacks when our little guy is older.
customer_reviews.author: S. Graczyk

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Formula pours out quickly and easy to fill. I don't like that there are more pieces to wash but they dry quickly. I picked this container since each compartment has a separate lid. I am ordering another now.
customer_reviews.author: LJH

customer_reviews.title: Babysitter approved!
customer_reviews.text: I've owned and used these for over a month and love them! Easy to use, clean and travel with. My babysitter is recommending them to all her other parents!
customer_reviews.author: SmithC

customer_reviews.title: My favorite!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a few different types of formula containers and love these the most. They each have their own lids, so can be used individually or snapped together and stacked. They’re also funneled where the formula comes out which makes it so the formula quickly slides right out with no shaking, banging, or readjusting the formula to make sure it all comes out. If I needed more, these are for sure the ones I’d buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: not great
customer_reviews.text: hard to put back together. threading isn't quite right. haven't even used them in the diaper bag due to issues getting them to piece back together after i washed them. quality is nice but not easy to use. waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Shawna  Bues

customer_reviews.title: ... far and are larger than I expected which is super nice. I knocked off one star because the ...
customer_reviews.text: These work well so far and are larger than I expected which is super nice. I knocked off one star because the bottom base is not that smooth of a twist off, but it could have just been the set I got. We like them enough to order more.
customer_reviews.author: Mindy Page

customer_reviews.title: Happy with them
customer_reviews.text: Great for powder formula. Love that I can split them up and keep one in my purse and 2 in the diaper bag.
customer_reviews.author: KG

customer_reviews.title: Very happy!
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy this product. The size and sturdiness exceeded my expectations. They stay locked together in the diaper bag but aren't hard to pull apart. Cleaning is easy and filling them up is painless. Overall awesome product.
customer_reviews.author: April Duncan

customer_reviews.title: my favorite one so far!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the color size and everything about this, but you have to completely let it dry out before filling. I love it so much Im actually ordering another one now =]
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Rush

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use. Easy to pack in a diaper bag. Easy to poor in a bottle while riding in a car.
customer_reviews.text: I love these little formula containers. Definitely easy to use and I would definitely buy more in the future. The only thing that I think some people would have a issue with. It does not have numbers on the size that let you know how many scoops you put in but as long as you know you are good.
customer_reviews.author: Redmom89

customer_reviews.title: Should come with tips on how to use, other than that great product
customer_reviews.text: Makes powder formula is easy to pour. The parts that twist are ok. For the containers (3parts to each) you simply CLICK to connect, and you to PULL away to separate. Voila! Love em!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dee C.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: These are the best formula dispensers I've ever bought. Ive bought two other brands and formula always gets stuck or moves around to the other compartments. I love how easy this is to get formula in and out and to clean! My daughter has 8 oz bottles (4 scoops of formula) and there is still plenty of room for more. Such a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: KO

customer_reviews.title: Easy and worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: I like how it comes apart. And also I could fit it in a bottle compartment if need to. And it’s super easy to clean. Hasn’t cracked or leaked. Worth the price
customer_reviews.author: Kami

customer_reviews.title: A mommy must have
customer_reviews.text: The ability to portion and stack is perfect for a diaper bag. I knocked a star because there’s so many sorts to clean. However it cleans easy.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: This was a formula saver!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing. So handy for just having one serving of formula in the diaper bag instead of a bulky three serving container! Super easy to use and pack! No more spilling formula everywhere, and it comes out of the spout easily!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Evenson

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I really like this formula holder. I don't have to worry about making a mess on the go. It's so easy to fill and use. The only down sides are, I wish it came with four compartments and the formula powder clings to the insides.
customer_reviews.author: Smeeks24

customer_reviews.title: Awesome.
customer_reviews.text: I took this on a flight with my son and was able to get just enough snacks in it to satisfy him the entire day! What a space saver. It was great, plus he likes to play by stacking and unstacking them.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to pour and keep things clean on the ...
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to pour and keep things clean on the go. I wish it was smaller with more containers but does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Troper

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for. Easy to use. Both ends open for easy formula filling and dispensing. Easy to clean. Can take as few or as many as you need with you.
customer_reviews.author: K and B Satterwhite

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, practical and brilliantly designed.
customer_reviews.text: These are excellent! Very practical for on the go moments. The funnel design is brilliant! The screw on tops and bottoms guarantee that no formula is wasted. This is an all around great product! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Doreen C.

customer_reviews.title: Buy them!
customer_reviews.text: Man, we LOVE these for our formula right now! Comes out easy and none wasted.
customer_reviews.author: Heather OBrien

customer_reviews.title: Wish I would’ve had this with my first baby
customer_reviews.text: So much better than the average formula dispensers that u can never get all of the formula out of.
customer_reviews.author: Savannah Rupert

customer_reviews.title: Get This!
customer_reviews.text: Even if it’s not on their baby list (and they will be formula feeding), get this! Clever invention. Durable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than they look
customer_reviews.text: Great for stacking and easy pour. They hold a lot more than I expected. I've only put 6 oz worth of formula and there is a lot more space.
customer_reviews.author: Whispywixie3

customer_reviews.title: These make it easy to take more or less formula to go depending ...
customer_reviews.text: These make it easy to take more or less formula to go depending on your situation. We used to overpay for the pouches that are a ripoff. These plus a big Nalgene bottle are a much better value.
customer_reviews.author: ryan

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I used these every day when using formula. After you baby is off formula you can use them to hold snacks!
customer_reviews.author: LHOTP

customer_reviews.title: Time saver!
customer_reviews.text: This is a life saver I bought 2 sets just so I could have formula ready for night feedings (2) and diaper bag (4). Huge time saver.
customer_reviews.author: KLayfield

customer_reviews.title: More suited for snacks maybe.
customer_reviews.text: I felt they took more room in the diaper bag. I think better suited for snacks than formula.
customer_reviews.author: Belia WarlingAmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Made traveling a breeze!
customer_reviews.text: Took this every trip we went on! Made making bottles on the go a breeze! Any formula mom/baby needs this! Seals great and snaps onto one another perfectly. Never had an issue
customer_reviews.author: Sarah August

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: These are easy to clean, cute and fit great in my diaper bag.
customer_reviews.author: Drea Martin

customer_reviews.title: Its so convenient and useful!
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have for the diaper bag! Its so convenient and useful!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best formula dispenser
customer_reviews.text: Best formula dispenser. While other dispensers makes formula stick on the bottom u have to tap it hard to get it off. But this dispenser never makes them stick. Perfectly made, and the are super cute. Bought 2 already. Will recommend to everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Stanley sugianto

customer_reviews.title: Love this! It is deff a little cheaper than ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this! It is deff a little cheaper than I’d like it to be... but for the price it does the trick!
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Williams

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Use for daycare. I like these because they don’t spill into each other like the divider type.
customer_reviews.author: KK

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: its too hard to open the bottom lid. At first the bottom lid seems tight to open. After opening the cap, if you try to open the bottom lid, then it opens easily. So I am updating my rating to 4 star.
customer_reviews.author: Mona

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these formula containers. Wish they would come in a 6-8 pack.
customer_reviews.author: Mochimama

customer_reviews.title: Browns and munchkin) and I like this one the best
customer_reviews.text: They are a bit bulky however, I have purchased other formula dispensers (Dr. Browns and munchkin) and I like this one the best. My son is on nutramigen and with the other dispenser I have a difficult time pouring them into the bottle (Formula will not come out). I'm assuming the way the inside is raised helps the formula to not stick.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: No mess pouring!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutley LOVE these! Perfect size for 8 oz bottle & no mess pouring!
customer_reviews.author: Loretta

customer_reviews.title: These are great! We use them to send formula to the ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great! We use them to send formula to the sitter; they fit nicely in the diaper bag, don't tip over, and are easy to find. Perfect for on the go!
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlin Spraul

customer_reviews.title: Great dispensers!
customer_reviews.text: These formula dispensers are my favorite so far. I've purchased the more expensive ones, but i like these more.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra SG

customer_reviews.title: Cute function is decent
customer_reviews.text: Cute. Like the size and shape. Seem tricky to get apart.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Space saver
customer_reviews.text: These fit nicely into my daughters diaper bag and leaves me with so much space.
customer_reviews.author: angelica brissett

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: very convenient, easy to use. works great for on the go parents, stackable makes it easy to find in the diaper bag.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Warden

customer_reviews.title: I liked them so much
customer_reviews.text: Formula doesn't get stuck in them at all! I liked them so much, I bought more.
customer_reviews.author: CoCo

customer_reviews.title: No mess for protein powder
customer_reviews.text: Use these for protein powder on the go. So far they are supper handy and no mess!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Price

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these! I use them for formula but you can use them for snacks as well!
customer_reviews.author: Kimber

customer_reviews.title: Good but not great
customer_reviews.text: I like it but it’s not as easy as the Tupperware type ones. It always seems to take up a lot of space in your diaper bag too.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm!
customer_reviews.text: We use these to pack my son's formula for daycare each day! They are easily cleanable and are an easy fit in the diaper bag!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Droege

customer_reviews.title: These are great for when babies start to eat more
customer_reviews.text: These are great for when babies start to eat more! It's almost impossible to get 3.5-4 scoops of formula into the traditional dispensers, but this one is a breeze!!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Great product - but check them carefully.
customer_reviews.text: These are super convenient for making bottles on the go, but one unit would not screw back together (large green lid and clear plastic piece) so I only have two. Still, makes packing the diaper bag much easier and saves me trouble while out and about. I would buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Bekah Michael

customer_reviews.title: One of the container lids does not quite fit when ...
customer_reviews.text: One of the container lids does not quite fit when you screw it on and it is difficult to get on and off. I tried it with all 3 colors and it was the same. The other two work great
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Perkins

customer_reviews.title: These were perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: These were perfect for my needs. I went and bought another set! They are easy to clean and take along.
customer_reviews.author: Hana E

customer_reviews.title: Great product, works perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Easy to use, no leaks, mess free bottles on the go.
customer_reviews.author: Jinxgirl

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not practical
customer_reviews.text: Product is kind of cheap. Low quality plastic molds. Neat idea though. I am just going to use it as a sand toy now.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Martelli

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The formula sticks to the sides and the connecting caps is difficult to line up at times.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for traveling- big enough to formula and rice into the bottle.
customer_reviews.text: I wish there were 5 or six in the pack but I’ll just buy another. Made traveling such a breeze and on-the-go even better
customer_reviews.author: BoiPartyOf6

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great design fast shipping compact size, no spilling or popping open. great
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: these come in sooo handy & are easy to clean!
customer_reviews.author: DL

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recomend
customer_reviews.text: We love this dispenser, we tried a few others, but this is by far the best one.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Love this! Makes transporting baby’s formula so much easier
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Makes transporting baby’s formula so much easier! Fits neatly in a diaper bag/purse when you’re on the go. Made of good quality and love the stackable snap apart feature as well. Wish I found these sooner!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: This is a terrible product. Poorly built. I can't put any snacks in there and be able to close it because of that cylinder thing in the center. A complete waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Sehrish

customer_reviews.title: Not easy to twist
customer_reviews.text: Super cute but somewhat hard to twist on and off.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie James

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Its imposible to open it. Tried with my hubby over than hour . Returning
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Strong plastic smell, made in china.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with a made in China label on it. Had a strong plastic smell to it. Immediately returned. Taking no risk with my baby.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Russo

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Love these but I wish it was a set of four.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Best formula dispensers!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best formula dispenser ive tried. I like how the wide base opens to allow easy filling but theres a smaller spout to facilitate pouring. Its easy to empty completely, unlike other ones where some formula at the end of the pour is difficult to get out. Its great that they stack on each other as well.
customer_reviews.author: Angela P

customer_reviews.title: NOT PRACTICAL
customer_reviews.text: The design allows you to hold like 10 Cheerios in it. I mean, it looks great and all, but even to hold formula, I returned it. It's pretty bulky too.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia Johnston

product_meta.title: HaloVa Baby Milk Powder Formula Dispenser, Infant Toddler Children Non-Spill Twist-Lock Stackable Snacks Storage Container, BPA Free, 3 Feeds
product_meta.description:
√ Package Included
Formula Dispenser*1
√ Friendly Customer Service
Always here to help, feel free to email or call with any questions or concerns.
√ 100% Money Back Guarantee
BUY with Full confidence & "Peace Of Mind", if you're not 100% satisfied send it back for a Refund within 90 Days of purchase.
feature_bullets: ❤ What's in the box - 1 Formula Dispenser.
❤ Always use the Material of the best Quality - Food grade Premium quality BPA free PP material, Nontoxic, Safe.
❤ Large Capacity - All 3 containers come with individual twist-lock secure lids, Making on-the-go feeding easier, can be freely combined.
❤ Multi-purpose - It also can be used as Snack Cups and Baby foods container, perfect for storing oatmeal cornflour and nuts etc.

❤ After-sales Service - Quality problems occur within one year replacement, lifetime warranty, if you're not completely satisfied, then CONTACT US and we will give you a 100% refund within 90 days of purchase. It is our intention to offer the BEST customer service on Amazon.
